com.camerontec.util.concurrent.executor

Interface NamedTaskExecutorService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CPULockingNamedTaskExecutorService, StandardNamedTaskExecutorService

    public interface NamedTaskExecutorService
    A simple executor service offering a general-purpose named task execution capability.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  NamedTaskExecutorService.ThreadNamingScheme
      Thread naming scheme for tasks submitted to a NamedTaskExecutorService

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean awaitTermination(long timeout, TimeUnit unit)
      Await termination of the service.
      void shutdown()
      Attempt an orderly shutdown of the service.
      List<Runnable> shutdownNow()
      Attempt to stop all actively executing tasks and halt the processing of waiting tasks.
      Future<?> submit(Runnable runnable, String taskName)
      Submit a task for execution on a single thread without CPU affinity.

    • Method Detail

      • submit

        Future<?> submit(Runnable runnable,
                 String taskName)
        Submit a task for execution on a single thread without CPU affinity.
        Parameters:
        runnable - The task.
        taskName - The task name.
        Returns:
        The future result.

      • shutdown

        void shutdown()
        Attempt an orderly shutdown of the service.

      • shutdownNow

        List<Runnable> shutdownNow()
        Attempt to stop all actively executing tasks and halt the processing of waiting tasks.
        Returns:
        list of tasks that never commenced execution

      • awaitTermination

        boolean awaitTermination(long timeout,
                         TimeUnit unit)
                  throws InterruptedException
        Await termination of the service.
        Parameters:
        timeout - The approximate timeout.
        unit - The time unit.
        Returns:
        true if the service was successfully terminated, false otherwise
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - If interrupted while waiting.
